# Flail, Heavy
## Overview
Similar to a flail, a heavy flail has a larger metal ball and a longer handle.


-tx-
| **Martial Weapon** ||||||||||
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| | **Two-Handed Melee Weapon** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range Increment** | **Weight** | **Type** | ** Special** |
| | Flail, heavy | 15 gp | 1d8 | 1d10 | x2 | — | 10 lbs. | B | — |

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 143
